snippet.title: Amber County - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Live the mysterious adventure of Steven O'Hara, the blind detective that solves cases using a strange method: "The Dreams". A recurring nightmare will force him to take some holidays in the "fancy" Amber County but he doesn't know that he will be involved in something greater than himself and the suicide of the young Berry Olsen will be only the beginning of his problems and of the County's ones. 

TWITTER - https://twitter.com/TheFafri

IndieDB - http://www.indiedb.com/games/amber-county
